text:
Directives that define paths fo auth files (AuthUserFile, AuthGroupFile,
AuthDBUserFile, AuthDBGroupFile, AuthDBMUSerFile, AuthDBMGroupFile,
AuthDigestFile, AuthDigestGroupFile, and probably others) search for files
starting in ServerRoot.

This is easy to implement (if I understand corretcly, apache switches to
ServerRoot on startup and access fiels from there), however, it is not easy to
work with it. We have multiple users, for whose we want to make access easier,
and we would invite a directive AuthRoot, which would define for current context
(server, virtualhost, directory, htaccess), where all the auth files are
located, if they are defined with relative path.
